Name: stxrelid
Description: Table containing the columns described by this object

Name: stxnamespace
Description: The OID of the namespace that contains this statistics object

Name: stxstattarget
Description: stxstattarget controls the level of detail of statistics accumulated for this statistics object by ANALYZE. A zero value indicates that no statistics should be collected. A negative value says to use the maximum of the statistics targets of the referenced columns, if set, or the system default statistics target. Positive values of stxstattarget determine the target number of "most common values‚Äù to collect.

Name: stxkeys
Description: An array of attribute numbers, indicating which table columns are covered by this statistics object; for example a value of 1 3 would mean that the first and the third table columns are covered

Name: stxkind
Description: An array containing codes for the enabled statistic kinds; valid values are: d for n-distinct statistics, f for functional dependency statistics, and m for most common values (MCV) list statistics
